src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) RC : I 'd like to have something with my friend who is sick . Is there a cafeteria ? # request ( location ( cafe ) ) @ G ( RC , go-to ( cafe ) ) ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . Lunch will be offered at midday if you have afternoon appointments . A snack may be offered after your appointment with the nurse . # inform ( location ( cafe ) ) @ AG ( RC , go-to ( cafe ) ) [start] RC : Thank you . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Thank you . [MASK] LP : Hello Mr Robot . I 'm looking for the lifts please . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] [MASK] LP : Thank you . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Thank you . [MASK] RC : Hello , I 'd like to go to the cardiology department . I was told it was on the second floor . Is there a lift to get there ? To go up ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Yes , absolutely . [MASK] [MASK] RC : And can you tell me where it is please ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . RC : Ok , thank you . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Thank you . [MASK] LP : Hello , can we have something to eat here ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Yes , absolutely . Lunch will be offered at midday if you have afternoon appointments . A snack may be offered after your appointment with the nurse . [MASK] [MASK] [end] LP : Oh , how lucky , thank you . # thank ( ) @ CG ( LP+RC , eat ( ) ) ARI : Thank you . # thank ( )

src: [start] LC : Well , the treatment was , well the appointment was very quick . I 'd love a coffee now . Do you know where I could get one ? [MASK] [MASK] RP : Um hello , we 'd like a coffee . Can you please tell us where to go to get a coffee ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] [MASK] RP : Ok , well thank you very much . [MASK] [MASK] LC : So we 'll take the lift back down , is that right ? [MASK] [MASK] [end] RP : Do you have to take the lift to go back down ? # request ( directions ( ground_floor ) ) @ G ( RP , go-to ( ground_floor ) ) ARI : Yes , of course . # affirm ( ) @ AG ( RP , go-to ( ground_floor ) ) RP : Can you tell us where the lift is ? # request ( location ( lifts ) ) @ G ( LC+RP , go-to ( lifts ) ) ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . Can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) RC : Hello ARI , actually , it 's midday and I 'd like to go to the restaurant , what time does it open ? # greet ( ) ; request ( location ( cafe ) ) ; request ( cafe ( opening_times ( opening_time ) ) ) @ G ( RC , go-to ( cafe ) ) ; G ( RC , get-info ( cafe ( opening_times ( opening_time ) ) ) ) ARI : At 11 AM . # inform ( cafe ( opening_times ( opening_time ) ) ) @ AG ( RC , get-info ( cafe ( opening_times ( opening_time ) ) ) ) [start] RC : 11 AM , thank you . And , where is it ? Where should I go ? Is it upstairs or on the ground floor ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Thank you ARI . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome . [MASK] ARI : How can I help you ? [MASK] LP : Where can we eat at lunchtime ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . You can order hot or cold sandwiches as well as hot or cold drinks . [MASK] [MASK] LP : It 's ... yes , yes . I did n't quite understand . [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . You can order hot or cold sandwiches as well as hot or cold drinks . [MASK] [MASK] LP : Where are the toilets ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . [MASK] [MASK] LP : Right or left ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RC : I 'm in a wheelchair , are the toilets wheelchair accessible ? [MASK] [MASK] [end] ARI : Yes , absolutely . # affirm ( ) @ AG ( RC , get-info ( toilet ( is_accessible ) ) ) RC : Thank you . # thank ( ) @ CG ( RC , get-info ( toilet ( is_accessible ) ) )

src: LC : Well , it 's not possible to get information on appointments . But um , how long does it last because there are three phases , if I understood correctly there are three ... three types of appointments , I 'd like to know how long it will last in total . ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) LC : Where can I get information ? # request ( location ( reception ) ) @ G ( LC , go-to ( reception ) ) [start] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RP : Ok , I 'm going to ask you a question ARI . I have an appointment at Broca hospital on the 25th , but I 'm not going to be able to make it . What do I do ? Who should I speak to ? Should I phone , what should I do ? ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . [MASK] LC : Is there a reception or a telephone number ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Yes . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . [MASK] LC : Well , in the meantime , what we can maybe do , since I 've just found my appointment paper and I know what time it starts , we could maybe go for lunch . From what time until what time can we have lunch ? [MASK] [MASK] LC : And ... Is it ? ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . [MASK] LC : And ... Is it possible to have lunch with someone who is hospitalised ? ARI : Yes of course . [MASK] LC : How should I do this ? Do I need to make a reservation ? ARI : No . [MASK] LC : How far in advance ? ARI : No . [MASK] LC : I 'm going to take the lift . I do n't remember where it is to go to the appointment room and see if someone can give information on appointments . [MASK] [MASK] [end] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . # inform ( directions ( lift ) ) @ AG ( LC , go-to ( room_17 ) ) LC : For the lift ? ARI : Yes . # affirm ( ) LC : Thank you very much . # thank ( ) ARI : Thank you . # thank ( ) ARI : See you around , have a nice day . # bye ( )

src: LP : Well , yeah , but you do what you want . [start] LP : What time is my appointment with the doctor ? [MASK] [MASK] RC : I think it 's 10 o'clock . [MASK] [MASK] RC : What time is the appointment ? [MASK] [MASK] RC : I have an appointment with the doctor . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : You 'll have several appointments with different health professionals , at least three . First , a nurse will ask you questions about your health and carry out an initial assessment of your current condition . Next , you will discuss your difficulties with a neuropsychologist who will suggest tests to assess your abilities as accurately as possible . Then , you will see a geriatrician who will summarise all this data and suggest different types of follow-up depending on your results . [MASK] [MASK] LP : And who is my geriatrician ? ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] RC : That 's a shame . [MASK] LP : And where is the consultation room to go see my doctor ? RC : Is it my turn ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RC : Is it right or left ? LP : Is there a reception at the hospital ? [MASK] [MASK] RC : Yes , I think so . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Where is the reception ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] RC : Where do I go for information ? [MASK] [MASK] LP : I 'd like a coffee . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Where is the cafeteria ?
